name: Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad
blurb: When his University is overrun with monsters, Dr. Bellwether must collect, train, and fuse Battle Dice to combat the invading hordes.

rewards.reward: BACKER: We will love you forever.  Thanks for your support!
THANK YOU: Show your support for Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad by becoming a backer, and receive a personalized Thank You message from a member of the development team.

DIGITAL DIPLOMA: Receive a Digital Diploma from John Brummel University bearing your name and area of study. Choose from a variety of Neo-Victorian majors, including: Metallurgy, Etiquette, Gears & Guns. \u2022 Includes personalized Thank You e-mail from the development team.

DIGITAL ART PACK: Festoon your desktop with a set of four high-resolution Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad backgrounds.  We'll also include a variety of themed icons to complete the set.  Take your support online with custom Tumblr, Twitter, and Facebook skins designed by the development team!  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.
NEO-VICTORIAN SKIRMISH SQUAD: The finished version of the game for PC or Mac (your choice). \u2022 Includes all previous reward tiers.

BETA ACCESS: Contribute at this reward tier and play the game before it's released!  You'll receive access to the Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad Beta build, as well as periodic updates. This is a fun way to keep track of our progress AND suggest ways to make the game even better.  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

COLLECTIBLE BUTTONS & CARDS: This is the first tier which includes physical rewards.  You'll receive four 1" collectible buttons from Terncraft Games, including a Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad design exclusive to our Kickstarter supporters.  You'll also receive a set of eight delightfully creepy promo cards.  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

DUST GNOME DESK BUDDY + FINAL GAME:  This is a truly unique reward tier!  Not only will you receive a digital copy of Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad in its final form (for PC or Mac, your choice), but you'll also receive an adorable Dust Gnome Desk Buddy.  These critters are handmade by the development team and are certain to make all of your friends jealous.  Make them froth with envy!  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

ART PACK: This tier is for art lovers!  You will receive a 32 page booklet featuring all of the collectible Lore in the game, as well as concept artwork, secrets, and fun never-before-seen doodles.  You'll also get a 24" x 36" Skirmish Squad poster to hang on the wall, stickers, and a digital copy of the game's soundtrack.  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

T-SHIRT + DIPLOMA:  Enjoy the Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad logo on a limited edition short-sleeve t-shirt.  It's a wearable symbol of your commitment to this game!  We'll also upgrade that digital JBU diploma to a physical one, printed on high quality card stock.  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

SPINOFF CARD GAME + TERNCRAFT CATALOG:  This reward tier is something truly special!  At Terncraft, we've been working on a spinoff dice and deck-building game based on the world of Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad.  You will receive an advanced copy of this product which includes (1) a two-player starter set of cards, (2) handsome, handmade wooden dice, (3) a bonus pack of additional dice and randomly selected cards, (4) required accessories - scoresheets, rule booklet, character mats - and (5)  a collectible box in which to store everything.  Holy cow!  If that wasn't enough, you'll also receive two additional games from Terncraft - The Thieving Tower and A Lighthearted Game - in digital format for PC or Mac (your choice).  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

PHYSICAL BOX:  You will receive a collectible game box, including the final version of Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad on DVD (for PC or Mac - your choice).  This exclusive set will include an instruction booklet (featuring hints, tips, and forbidden knowledge), a John Brummel University ID badge with your name on it, a one-of-a-kind map of the grounds, and a copy of the game's soundtrack on CD.  Finally, your name will be featured in the credits in a special section limited to Kickstarter backers at this reward tier and above.  \u2022  Includes previous reward tiers.

3D MAQUETTE:  At this premium tier, you will receive a 3D printed maquette featuring a character or monster from Neo-Victorian Skirmish Squad, hand-painted by our art team.  We've designed some really fantastic creatures for this game, so we'll give you a few different options to choose from! \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

JBU BOARD MEMBER + VINYL RECORD:  Become a board member of John Brummel University!  Your likeness (as interpreted by our talented art team) will be forever featured in a commemorative portrait located within the game.  You'll also receive a truly unique physical reward: a copy of the game's soundtrack on vinyl - a perfect gift for collectors!  \u2022  Includes all previous reward tiers.

BE A PLAYABLE CHARACTER + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: Have you ever wanted to be in a video game?  If so, this one-of-a-kind reward is truly amazing!  We will develop a playable character based upon your likeness and design input.  We'll also list you in the credits as an Executive Producer, for all the world to see. If you're in or around Orlando, FL, you'll get to hang out with the Terncraft crew and enjoy a celebratory party at the studio in your honor!  \u2022 Includes all previous reward tiers.
